Grades will be determined from the following assignments:

Five (5) programming assignments, worth 20 points each, total 100 points.
Four (4) in-class quizzes, worth 30 points each, total 120 points
Ten (10) in-class labs, worth 10 points each, total 110 points
One exam worth 50 points
